title: US airman's condition upgraded as he recovers from stabbing
text:
Published By: Philly News Nation/World - Today 
SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) - A U.S. airman hailed as a hero for helping thwart a European terror attack was upgraded from serious to fair condi...
